author: kfujino
msg: Fixed java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException when execute the command of Expire sessions of manager web application to context in which the session timeout is disabled.

author: hdu
msg: #i124394# fix inclusion of freetype's ftsynth.h header
the location of this header file changed with freetype 2.51 so we had to adapt.
On the other hand the header is not actually needed because we load the symbols
for synthetization of outlines dynamically to be compatible with freetype libs
that don't support them. So we can remove the header inclusion.

msg: OAK-1521 - Remove dependency on com.googlecode.json-simple from oak-core
